verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came to me saying

הָלֹ֡ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְקָֽרָאתָ֩ <S%H7121><s%> and cry בְאָזְנֵ֨י <S%H241><s%> in the ears יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God זָכַ֤רְתִּי <S%H2142><s%> I remember לָךְ֙ חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> thee the kindness נְעוּרַ֔יִךְ <S%H5271><s%> of thy youth אַהֲבַ֖ת <S%H160><s%> the love כְּלוּלֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H3623><s%> of thine espousals לֶכְתֵּ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> your following אַחֲרַי֙ <S%H310><s%> after בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> me in the wilderness בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in a land לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not זְרוּעָֽה׃ <S%H2232><s%> [that was] not sown

קֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [was] holiness יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD רֵאשִׁ֖ית <S%H7225><s%> [and] the firstfruits תְּבוּאָתֹ֑ה <S%H8393><s%> of his increase כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֹכְלָ֣יו <S%H398><s%> all that devour יֶאְשָׁ֔מוּ <S%H816><s%> him shall offend רָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> evil תָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> shall come אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> upon נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> upon them saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ

שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> ye the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מִשְׁפְּח֖וֹת <S%H4940><s%> and all the families בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What מָּצְא֨וּ <S%H4672><s%> found אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H1><s%> have your fathers בִּי֙ עָ֔וֶל <S%H5766><s%> What iniquity כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for רָחֲק֖וּ <S%H7368><s%> in me that they are gone far מֵעָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> and וַיֵּֽלְכ֛וּ <S%H1980><s%> and walked אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after הַהֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> vanity וַיֶּהְבָּֽלוּ׃ <S%H1891><s%> and are become vain

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no אָמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> Neither said אַיֵּ֣ה <S%H346><s%> Where יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> they Where [is] the LORD הַמַּעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> that brought us up אֹתָ֖נוּ <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הַמּוֹלִ֨יךְ <S%H1980><s%> led אֹתָ֜נוּ <S%H853><s%> בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> us through the wilderness בְּאֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through a land עֲרָבָ֤ה <S%H6160><s%> of deserts וְשׁוּחָה֙ <S%H7745><s%> and of pits בְּאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> through a land צִיָּ֣ה <S%H6723><s%> of drought וְצַלְמָ֔וֶת <S%H6757><s%> and of the shadow of death בְּאֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through a land לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no עָ֤בַר <S%H5674><s%> passed through בָּהּ֙ אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that no man וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> and where no man שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> and where

וָאָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> And I brought אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country הַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <S%H3759><s%> you into a plentiful לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> to eat פִּרְיָ֖הּ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit וְטוּבָ֑הּ <S%H2898><s%> thereof and the goodness וַתָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> thereof but when ye entered וַתְּטַמְּא֣וּ <S%H2930><s%> ye defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצִ֔י <S%H776><s%> my land וְנַחֲלָתִ֥י <S%H5159><s%> mine heritage שַׂמְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> and made לְתוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <S%H8441><s%> an abomination

הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> The priests לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not אָֽמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> said אַיֵּ֣ה <S%H346><s%> Where יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah וְתֹפְשֵׂ֤י <S%H8610><s%> catch הַתּוֹרָה֙ <S%H8451><s%> the law לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יְדָע֔וּנִי <S%H3045><s%> knew וְהָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> me not the pastors פָּ֣שְׁעוּ <S%H6586><s%> also transgressed בִ֑י וְהַנְּבִיאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> against me and the prophets נִבְּא֣וּ <S%H5012><s%> prophesied בַבַּ֔עַל <S%H1168><s%> by Baal וְאַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יוֹעִ֖לוּ <S%H3276><s%> [things that] do not profit הָלָֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> and walked

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore עֹ֛ד <S%H5750><s%> will yet אָרִ֥יב <S%H7378><s%> Wherefore I will yet plead אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> with you saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> and with בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and with your children's בְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> children אָרִֽיב׃ <S%H7378><s%> will I plead

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For עִבְר֞וּ <S%H5674><s%> For pass over אִיֵּ֤י <S%H339><s%> the isles כִתִּיִּים֙ <S%H3794><s%> of Chittim וּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> and see וְקֵדָ֛ר <S%H6938><s%> unto Kedar שִׁלְח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> and send וְהִֽתְבּוֹנְנ֖וּ <S%H995><s%> and consider מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> diligently וּרְא֕וּ <S%H7200><s%> and see הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> if הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> has been כָּזֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

הַהֵימִ֥יר <S%H4171><s%> have changed גּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> Hath a nation אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> [their] gods וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> gods וְעַמִּ֛י <S%H5971><s%> folk הֵמִ֥יר <S%H4171><s%> have changed כְּבוֹד֖וֹ <S%H3519><s%> their glory בְּל֥וֹא <S%H1094><s%> old יוֹעִֽיל׃ <S%H3276><s%> for [that which] doth not profit

שֹׁ֥מּוּ <S%H8074><s%> Be astonished שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> O ye heavens עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְשַׂעֲר֛וּ <S%H8175><s%> at this and be horribly afraid חָרְב֥וּ <S%H2717><s%> desolate מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> be ye very נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁתַּ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> two רָע֖וֹת <S%H7451><s%> evils עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> have committed עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> For my people אֹתִ֨י <S%H853><s%> עָזְב֜וּ <S%H5800><s%> they have forsaken מְק֣וֹר ׀ <S%H4726><s%> me the fountain מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters חַיִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> of living לַחְצֹ֤ב <S%H2672><s%> [and] hewed them out לָהֶם֙ בֹּאר֔וֹת <S%H877><s%> cisterns בֹּארֹת֙ <S%H877><s%> cisterns נִשְׁבָּרִ֔ים <S%H7665><s%> broken אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָכִ֖לוּ <S%H3557><s%> that can hold הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> no water

הַעֶ֙בֶד֙ <S%H5650><s%> bondage יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> [Is] Israel אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יְלִ֥יד <S%H3211><s%> born בַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> court ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> [slave]? why הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָבַֽז׃ <S%H957><s%> booty

עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and יִשְׁאֲג֣וּ <S%H7580><s%> roared כְפִרִ֔ים <S%H3715><s%> The young lions נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> add קוֹלָ֑ם <S%H6963><s%> aloud וַיָּשִׁ֤יתוּ <S%H7896><s%> and they made אַרְצוֹ֙ <S%H776><s%> his land לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H8047><s%> waste עָרָ֥יו <S%H5892><s%> his cities [נִצְּתָה כ] (נִצְּת֖וּ <S%H3341><s%> burn ק) מִבְּלִ֥י <S%H1097><s%> without יֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> without inhabitant גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted
נֹ֖ף <S%H5297><s%> of Noph [וְתַחְפְּנֵס כ] (וְתַחְפַּנְחֵ֑ס <S%H8471><s%> Tahanites ק) יִרְע֖וּךְ <S%H7462><s%> have broken קָדְקֹֽד׃ <S%H6936><s%> the crown of thy head

הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> not תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Hast thou not procured לָּ֑ךְ עָזְבֵךְ֙ <S%H5800><s%> this unto thyself in that thou hast forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהַ֔יִךְ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> when מוֹלִיכֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> led בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> But

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what לָּךְ֙ לְדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> And now what hast thou to do in the way מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <S%H8354><s%> to drink מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> the waters שִׁח֑וֹר <S%H7883><s%> Shihor וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what לָּךְ֙ לְדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the road אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria לִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <S%H8354><s%> to drink מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> the waters נָהָֽר׃ <S%H5104><s%> flood

תְּיַסְּרֵ֣ךְ <S%H3256><s%> shall correct רָעָתֵ֗ךְ <S%H7451><s%> Thine own wickedness וּמְשֻֽׁבוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H4878><s%> thee and thy backslidings תּוֹכִחֻ֔ךְ <S%H3198><s%> shall reprove וּדְעִ֤י <S%H3045><s%> thee know וּרְאִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> therefore and see כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it רַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> that [it is] an evil וָמָ֔ר <S%H4751><s%> [thing] and bitter עָזְבֵ֖ךְ <S%H5800><s%> that thou hast forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יִךְ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not פַחְדָּתִי֙ <S%H6345><s%> and that my fear אֵלַ֔יִךְ <S%H413><s%> you נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> [is] not in thee saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For מֵעוֹלָ֞ם <S%H5769><s%> For of old time שָׁבַ֣רְתִּי <S%H7665><s%> I have broken עֻלֵּ֗ךְ <S%H5923><s%> thy yoke נִתַּ֙קְתִּי֙ <S%H5423><s%> [and] burst מוֹסְרֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H4147><s%> thy bands וַתֹּאמְרִ֖י <S%H559><s%> and thou saidst לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not [אֶעֱבֹד כ] (אֶעֱבֹ֑ור <S%H5647><s%> serve ק) כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every גִּבְעָ֞ה <S%H1389><s%> hill גְּבֹהָ֗ה <S%H1364><s%> when upon every high וְתַ֙חַת֙ <S%H8478><s%> and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree רַעֲנָ֔ן <S%H7488><s%> and under every green אַ֖תְּ <S%H859><s%> You צֹעָ֥ה <S%H6808><s%> thou wanderest זֹנָֽה׃ <S%H2181><s%> playing the harlot

וְאָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I נְטַעְתִּ֣יךְ <S%H5193><s%> Yet I had planted שֹׂרֵ֔ק <S%H8321><s%> thee a noble vine כֻּלֹּ֖ה <S%H3605><s%> A completely זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed אֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> wholly a right וְאֵיךְ֙ <S%H349><s%> How נֶהְפַּ֣כְתְּ <S%H2015><s%> how then art thou turned לִ֔י סוּרֵ֖י <S%H5494><s%> into the degenerate plant הַגֶּ֥פֶן <S%H1612><s%> vine נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5237><s%> of a strange
